mapper.select: SELECT qchru.fUuid AS 'uuid', qchru.fQZOperationTypeUuid AS 'qzOperationTypeUuid', qchru.fStandardSpecies AS 'standardSpecies', qchru.fStartKeywordCount AS 'startKeywordCount', qchru.fEndKeywordCount AS 'endKeywordCount', qchru.fAmount AS 'amount', qchru.fCreatetime AS 'createTime', qchru.fUpdatetime AS 'updateTime' FROM t_qz_charge_rule qchru WHERE qchru.fQZOperationTypeUuid = #{qzOperationTypeUuid} order by qchru.fStartKeywordCount

SELECT qk.fAchieveLevel AS 'achieveLevel', qc.fStandardSpecies AS 'standardSpecies', qc.fStartKeywordCount AS 'startKeywordCount', qc.fEndKeywordCount AS 'endKeywordCount', qc.fAmount AS 'amount' FROM t_qz_charge_rule qc LEFT JOIN t_qz_operation_type qot ON qot.fUuid = qc.fQZOperationTypeUuid LEFT JOIN t_qz_keyword_rank_info qk ON qk.fQZSettingUuid = qot.fQZSettingUuid WHERE qot.fQZSettingUuid = #{qzSettingUuid} AND qot.fOperationtype = #{terminalType} AND qk.fDataProcessingStatus = 1 GROUP BY qc.fUuid
